title: unique icons to oce?
body:
now available to any old Joe on other servers.... cmon, why are you always shafting oce.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/02/red-post-collection-zac-in-tank-update.html

replies.body: Well they need to forsake oce server skin in exchange for money, then when they have us feeling special about exclusive things they make them non exclusive, its nothing personal, its just business. Gotta break the masses to get more out of them. You get more out of a company hiring broken men than prideful men don't you.

Riot doesn't like us and so they don't let us have exclusives.

They don't like us because we are the most toxic region and our meta is unpredictable and we do silly things (we even have some mad people who do silly builds or offmeta lane picks even in among our challenger players) and riot doesn't like us making balancing more confusing.
